name: Terminal Hacker Game (Word Guessing Game)
description:
Hello Everyone,

This my first ever game.

This Game is a Terminal Hacker (not a hacking game but a word guessing game )

In this game you will have to select the level and then the hint will come and you will answer it to get to win screen,

IMPORTANT KEYS

Use menu to return to home 

Use exit/close/quit  to exit game and then close the browser window 

Any Comments/Feedback would be highly encouraged and will be highly appreciated as well. I will Look Forward To do any change if any bugs are found by the community. Just put in the comments and i will fix the bug issue.

Also Suggestions for new levels will also be highly appreciated !!
